title: You can do it
brief_description: Presented by and starring Shari Lewis, the well-loved ventriloquist, storyteller and singing personality in a magical, fun-filled hour of easy magic, simple puppets, dopey dares and silly stunts. Join Shari and the beloved Lamb Chop and Hush Puppy as they celebrate Charley Horse’s birthday party with music and singing, rope tricks, paper tricks, card tricks, a demonstration on ventriloquism and making puppets from paper and fruit.
